title: Stylish Yet Warmly Dressed
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Brrr~~~ It’s so cold~~~! The wind! It’s so windy today!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah, it got even colder today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Karin-san, you don’t look cold! Ah, good thing I wore socks over my tights...... But I look kinda unstylish.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I have a little secret to not looking cold. Do you want to know, Hanayo-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Huh, a secret......? S-Sure......!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>The tights I’m wearing have a higher denier than they look.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh? They look like what you usually wear......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>These are fake tights. Try feeling the fabric. You’ll understand what I mean.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>......Whoa! That’s thick! So, these...... are made to match your skin color to look like your skin is showing through the tights? What......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yup. They’re leggings designed to make you not notice the high denier. That way, you can look stylish while staying warm. Do you wanna go shopping for some?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Let’s go! I want to be stylish and warm, too~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
